thread.title: 2018 Volvo XC60 Revealed: It’s All About That Luxe
thread.title_full: 2018 Volvo XC60 Revealed: It’s All About That Luxe

author: Rich Ceppos
title: 2018 Volvo XC60 Revealed: It’s All About That Luxe
text:
-It’s telling that Volvo’s all-new XC60 crossover was introduced to the world’s press not by a safety engineer, but by a designer. And not just any designer: Thomas Ingenlath is the architect of Volvo’s recent move into a new era of stunning Scandinavian aesthetics, a change so radical that it’s getting hard to remember that Volvos once had all the style of a Cheerios box, the perfect look for a brand with a tunnel-vision focus on safety. READ MORE ›› 
-
